title: New Project Skins!

embed.description: PROJECT: Hunters Teaser from the Worlds Stream On: https://www.twitch.tv/riotgames Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights Facebook for all you FB Users who want to keep upto date: https://www.facebook.com/Skinspotlights For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/

body:
Has anyone seen this yet?! I love the theme of this, quite spooky actually. Another surprise clip shown during worlds. 
What champions do you think the new Project skins will be for? 

If you listen closely, you can hear a gunshot (maybe a Jhin R shot?), a Vi q charging?, and A vayne auto attack? 

Don't know if that determines what skins they'll be but damn. I guess if it was out of those three, the voice speaking could be vayne. The 2nd image seems like a female character to me, possibly with something covering the face, but it reminds me a lot of project ekko.
